name: Beetle Struggle
description:
Once upon a time in the cold winter 

A family of dung beetles was hit by the storm
when the father woke up on a nearby rock the kids were missing 
the father rolled some dirt from the ground and promised himself to bring them back home before its too late !!

-------------------------------

Game information :

this game was made by one person for the gmtk game-jam 2020
